articles.content: ORLANDO, Fla. (AP) Jungle Cruise, one of the original Disney parks’ rides, is getting a 21st century remodel in yet the latest update to a legacy theme park ride that has been criticized in years pas… [+1417 chars]

articles.title: Tory Lanez seeks right to speak on Megan Thee Stallion shooting case after judge ordered his silence - Daily Mail
articles.description: In court documents, Lanez said it's 'unfair' that Megan can speak on the July incident in publications and across social media, but he's not allowed to defend himself due to the court order.
articles.content:
Tory Lanez wants to speak his mind about the Megan Thee Stallion case after a judge ordered him to stay silent.
